text:
Chrissy Teigen and John Legend still seem wildly in love even after years of marriage and one incredibly adorable child. They also seem to still have fun with each other, at home, on the red carpet, and of course, on Chrissy’s show, Lip Sync Battle. Chrissy shared a sneak peak on Sunday morning for an episode that aired later that night, featuring Zendaya doing a spot on Bruno Mars impersonation. The clip highlights the very special moment when Chrissy lives out her fantasy of sharing an iconic “Spider-Man kiss.” With her husband, of course.

Related

Check out the post on X

The best part of this may be that Chrissy is playing Spider-Man instead of Mary Jane. She’s lowered from the rafters in the full costume, though LL Cool J gives her an assist with the mask. Then John trots out, happy to fulfill all his wife’s desires. As usual. The only thing they’re missing is some pouring rain.

In case you can’t get enough of Chrissy in that costume, she benevolently shared some footage of her doing the most hilarious Spidey-dance on the planet:

Check out the post on X

But John still loves her.
title: Chrissy Teigen John Legend Reenact Spider-Man Kiss: Video
